籤詩版本二:
Ua ʻōlelo ʻia ʻaʻole i lohe ʻia, ʻo ka lole maikaʻi a me ka uku maikaʻi e alakaʻi maoli i ka pōmaikaʻi
Mai hoʻomanaʻo ʻoe i ka mea i hana ʻia i kēlā manawa.
詩意:
ʻO kēia hexagram ke kiʻi o ke keiki e ʻike ana i kona makuahine.
Laki maikai i na kanaka hanohano a pau.
解曰: Hoʻohana ʻia no ka manaʻolana. Hauʻoli nā kānaka a pau. Mai ka lehulehu. Me he keiki lā e hālāwai ana me kona makuahine.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Ke ʻimi nei ʻo Dong Zhong i nā hoahānau
ʻO Dong Zhong ke keiki a Dong Yong ma ka moʻokūʻauhau Han. Ma hope mai, ma hope o ke kōkua ʻana o ka fairy iā Dong Yong i ka uku ʻana i kāna mau aie a hoʻōla iā ia iho, ua hoʻi ʻo ia i ka lani.
Ua hoʻohaʻahaʻa pinepine ʻia ʻo Dong Zhong, ʻehiku mau makahiki, no ka mea ʻaʻohe ona makuahine, no laila makemake ʻo ia e ʻimi iā ia.
Ma lalo o ke alakaʻi ʻana a Mr. Yi, ua hele ʻo Dong Zhong i Taibai Mountain e ʻimi iā ia ma Iulai 7. Ua ʻike ʻia ka fairy a ʻike hope i kona makuahine.
聖意: Ua pilikia au ma ka home, he mea maʻamau, pule au no ka pōmaikaʻi, laki maikaʻi i ka ʻoihana, male a male male, kahi wahine hele wāwae ma Liujia ke keʻakeʻa nei i ke kula, pilikia nā ilo silika, paʻakikī ke loaʻa i nā kānaka ma muli o ka lilo ka holoholona, ​​paʻakikī ka hoʻopiʻi ʻana, conservative ka neʻe ʻana, nele ka waiwai, ke pule nei nā maʻi no ka pōmaikaʻi ma nā mauna a me nā lua kupapaʻu.
古人: Ke ʻimi nei ʻo Dong Zhong i nā hoahānau
